Room.Name: Adlermann Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Adlermann Way, west of the Lithium Lanterns shop.
Room.LongDescription: The Lithium Lanterns shop provides the guards and everyday citizens with the essential lanterns to light up their paths in the dark areas of town. No one should be without a lantern. On the west side of the road is the west City Wall, which runs parallel to Adlermann Way.
